direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manage the proxy setting, with setProxy enabling and unsetProxy disabling it.
Both methods modify the internal state of the object by setting a specific configuration.
Both methods involve setting up configurations (proxy for setProxy, and API key/signature for createAutoInvest) that affect subsequent operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing proxy settings before setting the proxy can help in testing different initial states.
Unsetting the proxy after setting it can help in testing the state transitions.
Verifying the proxy configuration can help in asserting the correct state after setting the proxy.
